consulting-agreement.title: Consulting Agreement
consulting-agreement.description: Access specialized expertise without the cost of full-time employees. Define project scope and protect your interests with clear terms.

employee-bonus-plan.title: Employee Bonus Plan
employee-bonus-plan.description: Create a fair bonus system to motivate employees and reward good performance. Prevents disputes about bonus criteria.

employee-evaluation-form.title: Employee Evaluation Form
employee-evaluation-form.description: Review employee performance fairly and consistently. Documents achievements and areas for improvement for both parties.

employee-handbook.title: Employee Handbook
employee-handbook.description: Set clear workplace rules and expectations for your team. Covers policies, benefits, and procedures every employee should know.

employee-non-disclosure-agreement.title: Employee Non Disclosure Agreement
employee-non-disclosure-agreement.description: Protect your business secrets and confidential information when hiring employees. Prevents sharing trade secrets with competitors.

employee-warning-notice.title: Employee Warning Notice
employee-warning-notice.description: Formally document employee performance issues or policy violations. Creates a paper trail for potential termination.

employment-contract.title: Employment Contract
employment-contract.description: Hire employees with clear terms about salary, benefits, responsibilities, and expectations. Protects both employer and employee.

employment-offer-letter.title: Employment Offer Letter
employment-offer-letter.description: Secure top talent with professional job offers that stand out. Make your offer official while giving candidates confidence in your organization.

employment-termination-letter.title: Employment Termination Letter
employment-termination-letter.description: Protect your business from wrongful termination claims. End employment relationships professionally while maintaining legal compliance.

employment-verification-letter.title: Employment Verification Letter
employment-verification-letter.description: Help employees secure loans, rentals, and new opportunities. Provide official employment verification that meets lender requirements.

equity-incentive-plan.title: Equity Incentive Plan
equity-incentive-plan.description: Give employees ownership stakes in your company to motivate long-term commitment. Popular with startups and growing businesses.

executive-employment-agreement.title: Executive Employment Agreement
executive-employment-agreement.description: Attract and retain top executive talent with comprehensive agreements. Secure leadership commitment while protecting your business interests.

independent-contractor-agreement.title: Independent Contractor Agreement
independent-contractor-agreement.description: Hire freelancers and contractors legally. Protects your business and ensures the worker isn't classified as an employee.

internship-agreement.title: Internship Agreement
internship-agreement.description: Develop future talent while protecting your business. Set clear expectations for intern programs that benefit both parties.

invention-assignment-agreement.title: Invention Assignment Agreement
invention-assignment-agreement.description: Ensure your company owns any inventions or innovations your employees create while working for you. Essential for tech companies.

job-application-form.title: Job Application Form
job-application-form.description: Streamline your hiring process and ensure consistent candidate evaluation. Collect all necessary information to make informed hiring decisions.

leave-of-absence-request-form.title: Leave Of Absence Request Form
leave-of-absence-request-form.description: Manage employee leave requests professionally while maintaining productivity. Ensure legal compliance with family and medical leave laws.

non-compete-agreement.title: Non Compete Agreement
non-compete-agreement.description: Prevent employees from working for competitors or starting competing businesses after they leave. Protection varies by state.

offer-letter.title: Offer Letter
offer-letter.description: Make job offers quickly and professionally. Secure candidate acceptance with clear terms that protect both parties.

progressive-discipline-policy.title: Progressive Discipline Policy
progressive-discipline-policy.description: Create a fair system for addressing employee problems with clear steps from warning to termination. Protects from wrongful termination claims.

proof-of-income-letter.title: Proof Of Income Letter
proof-of-income-letter.description: Support employees' financial goals with official income documentation. Meet lender requirements for mortgages, loans, and credit applications.

resignation-letter.title: Resignation Letter
resignation-letter.description: Leave your job on good terms while protecting future opportunities. Maintain professional relationships and secure positive references.

resignation-letter-personal.title: Resignation Letter Personal
resignation-letter-personal.description: Resign professionally while maintaining privacy about personal matters. Preserve relationships and reputation during career transitions.

salary-verification-letter.title: Salary Verification Letter
salary-verification-letter.description: Help employees achieve their financial goals with official salary verification. Meet strict lender requirements for major purchases.

severance-agreement.title: Severance Agreement
severance-agreement.description: Handle layoffs professionally while protecting your business from legal claims. Provide fair compensation that maintains your company's reputation.

telecommuting-agreement.title: Telecommuting Agreement
telecommuting-agreement.description: Maximize remote work productivity while maintaining team cohesion. Establish clear expectations that ensure business continuity.

two-weeks-notice-letter.title: Two Weeks Notice Letter
two-weeks-notice-letter.description: Transition out of your role professionally while maintaining industry relationships. Give employers time to plan your replacement.

work-from-home-agreement.title: Work From Home Agreement
work-from-home-agreement.description: Expand your talent pool and reduce office costs with remote work options. Maintain productivity standards while offering flexibility.
